agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Agriculture & Livestock TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM, Thursday, February 21, 2019 PLACE: E2.036 CHAIR: Rep. Drew Springer The committee on Agriculture and Livestock will meet to hear invited testimony only from: · Texas Department of Agriculture · Texas Animal Health Commission · Texas AgriLife · State Soil and Water Conservation Board · Texas Farm Bureau · Texas and Southwest Cattle Raisers Association · Texas Cattle Feeders Association · Texas Poultry Federation · Texas Association of Dairymen · Texas Corn Producers · Plains Cotton Growers Inc. · Texas Grain and Feed Association · Texas Forestry Association NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
